entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 11:48AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...UNSEASONABLY STRONG STORM TO BRING GUSTY WINDS AND HEAVY RAIN SATURDAY INTO SUNDAY... A strong area of low pressure (982 mb) in the North Pacific will arrive over the Alaska Peninsula Saturday afternoon. The front associated with this low will lift northward and extend across the northern Gulf coast from Kodiak Island to Prince William Sound.
